meanings.definition: The act of making something less mysterious or difficult to understand.
meanings.sent1: The demystifications of complex scientific concepts help students grasp the material easily.
meanings.sent2: She specializes in the demystifications of ancient myths for modern readers.
meanings.sent3: The magician's demystifications of his tricks left the audience both amazed and amused.
meanings.sent4: Her demystifications of the art world revealed its inner workings like never before.
meanings.sent5: Through his demystifications, the professor made even the most challenging topics seem simple.

meanings.definition: The process of removing the mystery or confusion surrounding something.
meanings.sent1: The demystifications of the legal system helped the citizens understand their rights better.
meanings.sent2: The demystifications of the new technology made it accessible to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The detective's demystifications of the case led to a surprising revelation.
meanings.sent4: Her demystifications of the recipe turned a complicated dish into an easy meal to prepare.
meanings.sent5: The demystifications of the ancient artifact shed light on its true purpose.
